text: Geremia Toia (born 19 January 1966) is an Italian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Gallarate
title: Geremia Toia
